sections.heading: Applicability
sections.text: 11.931 Applicability.—Sections 11.93-11.9352 shall apply when an Article V convention is called for the purpose of proposing amendments to the Constitution of the United States.

As used in ss. 11.93-11.9352, the term:(1)“Alternate delegate” means an individual who is appointed as an alternate delegate as provided by law
